markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Consistent Surge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2474) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Android" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=334" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 73 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[Nanite Surge](/Feats.aspx?ID=2463)

</column>

---

Your nanites are incredibly effective, capable of improving your body's efficiency regularly. You can use Nanite Surge with a frequency of once per 10 minutes, rather than once per hour.
name: Consistent Surge
